ygData.subject: Poll results for shadowknight
ygData.msgSnippet: The following shadowknight poll is now closed.  Here are the final results: POLL QUESTION: I have been playing an SK since EQ went online.  Leveling characters
ygData.messageBody:
The following shadowknight poll is now closed. Here are the
final results:


POLL QUESTION: I have been playing an SK since EQ went
online. Leveling characters has gotten
easier and easier over time with
imroved tradeskills, focus effects,
revisions to the combat tables,
filtration of items down through the
economy, etc. Do you think:

CHOICES AND RESULTS
- this has made playing an SK too easy, I long for the old days., 0 votes, 0.00%
- SK's will rule no matter what Verant does to the game., 1 votes, 20.00%
- it is about the right difficulty now, SK's rule the high-end game now., 3 votes, 60.00%
- it is still too hard, the Orcs in East Commons still kick my butt everytime I come by., 0 votes, 0.00%
- ...what? This list still EXISTS?!?!?, 1 votes, 20.00%

INDIVIDUAL VOTES
- this has made playing an SK too easy, I long for the old days.
- SK's will rule no matter what Verant does to the game.
- toymachine@...
- it is about the right difficulty now, SK's rule the high-end game now.
- scottrobts@...
- blademaster@...
- mbs@...
- it is still too hard, the Orcs in East Commons still kick my butt everytime I come by.
- ...what? This list still EXISTS?!?!?
- dave.crawford@...
